titles.title: A resolution to recognize the outstanding service of the Architect of the Capitol, the Honorable George M. White, for the restoration of the Statue of Freedom.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/11/1994--Introduced. Commends the Honorable George M. White (Architect of the Capitol) for outstanding service to the Capitol and to the Nation for restoring the Statue of Freedom.
